channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 11:15 The threat of shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Find attention, the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 🟡 11:15 The threat of shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Find attention, the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#m_nikopol_that_nikopol. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
